entry.title: Prologue
entry.summary: About We are living admist the age of innovation. Too many novel techniques are poping out with enthusiastic people devoting their life for it. Only if you know where the wind is blowing, then you shall see your destination. Just like the means of production metioned by Karl Marx in 19th century, the computational power is the new resource that everyone is craving to possess. But unlike lands...
